footer.newsletterText: Get the latest insights on automation, DevOps, and open-source contributions.
footer.companyDescription: Empowering organizations through intelligent automation. We deliver cutting-edge solutions that transform workflows and boost productivity for developers and IT professionals worldwide.

hero.title: Streamline Your
hero.description: Professional consulting services that automate repetitive tasks for developers and IT professionals. Boost productivity with PowerShell DSC, DevOps solutions, and open-source contributions.

about.title: Empowering Organizations Through
about.description1: Viscalyx is a specialized consulting company dedicated to transforming how developers and IT professionals work. As a sole proprietorship, we provide personalized, high-quality automation solutions that eliminate repetitive tasks and streamline complex workflows.
about.description2: Our expertise spans PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC), DevOps automation, and contributing to open-source projects that benefit the entire development community. We believe in building solutions that not only solve immediate problems but also create lasting value.

precision.title: Precision & Excellence
precision.description: Every automation solution is crafted with meticulous attention to detail and tested thoroughly.

clientCentric.title: Client-Centric Approach
clientCentric.description: Understanding your unique challenges to deliver tailored solutions that fit your workflow.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: Leveraging cutting-edge technologies and best practices to solve complex problems.

openSource.title: Open Source Commitment
openSource.description: Actively contributing to the community and sharing knowledge through open-source projects.

team.title: The People Behind Viscalyx
team.description: Meet the dedicated professionals who drive innovation and deliver exceptional automation solutions for our clients worldwide.

johlju.bio: Passionate automation expert with over 30 years of experience in IT. Specialized in PowerShell DSC, DevOps, and open-source contributions. Dedicated to helping organizations streamline their development workflows.

testsson.bio: Creative content strategist and social media expert who brings technical concepts to life through engaging visual storytelling and community building.

joinTeam.title: Join Our Growing Team
joinTeam.description: We're always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for automation and excellence. Let's build the future of development workflows together.

johlju.biography:
Johan Ljunggren is a seasoned IT professional with over three decades of diverse experience in the IT industry. Starting from traditional system administration, he has mastered the transition to modern DevOps practices, cloud computing, and infrastructure as code. His expertise now spans everything from managing complex IT infrastructures and developing enterprise-level applications to crafting strategic IT architectures. Johan has played a key role in designing sustainable, secure, and cost-effective solutions that align with organizational goals, primarily within health care IT.

Throughout his career, Johan has contributed in various roles including system technician, developer, software architect, and enterprise architect. He has contributed to projects for major clients, and has a strong background in systems integration, infrastructure management, and software architecture.

Johan is not only technically skilled but also a proactive and detail-oriented team player. He stays up to date with industry trends and technologies, with a current focus on integration and architectural strategy for healthcare systems. Outside of his professional roles, he is an active contributor and maintainer in the global PowerShell DSC open source community. He has contributed to numerous open source projects used by developers worldwide.

Johan brings a unique combination of technical depth and practical experience to every engagement. His ability to translate complex technical concepts into business value helps organizations understand the true impact of automation. He doesn't just implement solutions - he educates teams, establishes sustainable practices, and ensures long-term success.

testsson.biography:
Test brings a fresh perspective to technical communication with a background in digital marketing, content creation, and community management. Her experience spans from traditional marketing agencies to tech startups, where she discovered her passion for making complex technical concepts accessible to diverse audiences.

Specializing in visual storytelling and social media strategy, Test excels at creating compelling narratives around technical products and services. Her expertise in content strategy helps bridge the gap between technical teams and their audiences, ensuring that complex automation solutions are communicated clearly and effectively to stakeholders at all levels.

Test's unique ability to humanize technology makes her invaluable to technical organizations looking to improve their market presence. She transforms dry technical documentation into engaging content, builds communities around products, and helps teams communicate their value proposition effectively. Her work ensures that technical excellence translates into business growth and customer engagement.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: We collect information you provide directly to us and information we collect automatically when you use our services:
items: Contact information (name, email address, phone number)

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the information we collect to:
items: Communicate with you about our services
Send you newsletters and marketing communications (with your consent)
Analyze website usage and improve user experience

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
